name: GIRF (working title)
description:
### GIRF (working title)

Controls for the game are W to move up and A or D to rotate. You can use O to shoot.

The little white rectangle square dudes walking around can be picked up if you land close enough to them they'll hop on slowly one by one. 

This is currently an unfinished demo of a game I was working on during study. The game is about a space ship the flies around and collects little dudes and shoots enemies, the ship can land upside down sideways pretty much anywhere and the main goal is to rescue the little dudes.

This game is currently and sadly dead. I might come back to it later on

The game is inspired by gravitron.
